title: Connect to AWS Opensearch from AWS Lambda
description: This snippet demonstrates how to connect and ingest data to AWS Opensearch Serverless collection from an AWS Lambda function with IAM authentication.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: Amazon OpenSearch Serverless is an on-demand auto scaling configuration for Amazon OpenSearch Service. An OpenSearch Serverless collection is an OpenSearch cluster that scales compute capacity based on your application's needs. OpenSearch Serverless provides a simple, cost-effective option for infrequent, intermittent, or unpredictable workloads. Connect to the Opensearch Serverless collection using lambda function.

codeTabs.title: Copy the code into your Lambda function
codeTabs.description: Follow the AWS Lambda instructions for packaging with dependencies and uploading in .zip format. Install the required go packages to be imported

authors.headline: Presented by Abhishek Agawane
